attributes.action: Form a temporary Coalition Government of National Unity during Covid-19 outbreak
attributes.additional_details: The Prime Minister has already described this as "a wartime government", as a published historian himself with his book "The Churchill Factor" , the time is right for the PM to follow the man who has been his exemplar and for the period that we are in the grip of the Covid-19 epidemic to invite politicans from all parties currently represented in the UK Parliament to join a Coalition Government of National Unity.
attributes.background: During the current Coronavirus crisis, party politics should be placed aside as we should all be working together to defeat it, therefore emulating the wartime cabinet of Winston Churchill representatives of all political parties should be invited into a cabinet for the duration of the UK outbreak

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301563

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
